attributes.additional_details: Community, culture, unity with the Greeks inspite of brexit! Also I want saganaki dam it!
attributes.background:
Greek Easter has been a long established tradition in our community. 

This year the event has been cancelled due to bbc coverage of the local elections.

One of two things must happen! 
1) Cancel the local elections 
2) order the one know as Zoe to host the event none the less!

rejection.details: The UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for Easter celebrations.
